description: The joke is a play on the idea of family bonding and the literal sticking of snowflakes.
title: Snowflake Family
n_1: Alice and Grandpa Joe watch snowflakes fall outside.
c1_1: Look how they stick together on the driveway!
c2_1: Just like our family in winter, right?
n_2: The driveway is covered in a blanket of snow.
c1_2: Yes, we always come together when it's cold.
c2_2: That's the warmth of family, Alice.
n_3: They smile, sipping hot cocoa by the window.
c2_3: Me too, dear. It's our special bond.
n_4: Together, they watch the snowflakes, feeling the family bond.
c1_4: We're like these snowflakes, aren't we?
